name: Medbelle
description:
Healthcare is one of the least digitised and standardised industries, making it incredibly inefficient and often causing negative patient experiences.

As the first digital hospital, we are rebuilding the patient experience for elective medical procedures from scratch (started with cosmetic, bariatric and eye surgery and now also orthopaedic). 

We work with the best surgeons and rent operating space from selected facilities - while providing an outstanding, digital-first and transparent patient experience and a personal patient care adviser to guide you from start to finish. This is what allows us to provide patients with an outstanding level of care that we would love to experience ourselves. By also providing technology that integrates the entire patient journey for providers, we can reduce costs and, therefore, improve elective procedures across the quadruple aim: better outcomes, better patient experience, lower costs, better provider experience.

jobs.title: Vice President of Marketing (VP, direct-to-consumer) (M/F/X)
jobs.description:
Hello,


My name is Sebastian and I am the Head of Growth here at Medbelle, where it is our mission to build the first digital hospital. First of all, let me tell you what Medbelle is all about.

As the first digital hospital, we are rebuilding the patient experience for elective medical procedures from scratch (started with cosmetic, bariatric and eye surgery and now also orthopaedic). We work with the best surgeons and rent operating space from selected facilities - while providing an outstanding, digital-first and transparent patient experience and a personal patient care adviser to guide our patients from start to finish. This is what allows us to provide patients with a stellar level of care that we would love to experience ourselves. By also providing technology that integrates the entire patient journey for providers, we can reduce costs, make their lives much easier and, therefore, improve elective procedures across the quadruple aim: better outcomes, better patient experience, lower costs, better provider experience.

About the role

Backed by renowned international investors, we are providing an ever-growing number of patients with the highest quality of care the UK has to offer. Having grown from a few visionary early employees to a thriving post-Series A company in a short period of time,  we are convinced that we already provide the best service available for patients. Our main challenge now is building a strong consumer brand and scaling our marketing communication.

We are now looking for an experienced direct-to-consumer VP of Marketing to build the most-trusted brand for medical procedures.

-Define and execute the marketing strategy (supported by the Head of Growth & founders)
-Help define and build the Medbelle consumer brand across multiple treatment verticals, both in the UK and soon internationally
-Leverage existing market and user understanding and make the right choices to build on it
-Manage the growth and optimisation of performance channels and partnerships and test and build out new ones mostly based on content and PR
-Control marketing budgets and own marketing targets as well as strategic initiatives
-Lead and grow a team of world-class marketers, both in-house and freelancers
-Collaborate with the Patient Care, Product and Operations team to create the best possible patient experience and performance

Requirements
-Proven experience in digital and offline marketing including at least 5+ years of leadership experience
-Experience in digital, fast-paced companies, with significant experience in managing direct-to-consumer marketing budgets while owning a multi-million revenue and budget responsibility
-Experience with building category-defining consumer brands
-Strong understanding of data analysis methods and market & user research
-Experience and understanding of all typical digital scale-up marketing channels with a very strong understanding of some
-Fluent English, both verbally and in writing, German is a plus
-Entrepreneurial and results-driven personality that is not only highly analytical but also creative and hands-on in nature
-Cooperative leadership and communication style and passion to improve healthcare together with a team of visionaries

What the Medbelle family is like

Our Medbelle family is a small and truly international team (80%+ internationals). We pride ourselves on our company culture that’s focused on building a great service with a professional emphasis on numbers and growth.

As a typical Berlin startup, we, of course, have the usual fun stuff: free coffee & tea, fruits, pancake Tuesdays, an amazing office in Kreuzberg, Friday memes and team events we probably shouldn’t talk about here. But what I love most about our team is the honest desire to help improve the experiences of our patients - that’s what keeps us motivated and driven.

Sebastian (Head of Growth), Leander & Daniel (Founders)

jobs.title: Business Intelligence (BI) Manager (M/F/X)
jobs.description:
Hi there!

My name is Sebastian and I am the Head of Growth here at Medbelle, where it is our mission to build the first digital hospital.

First of all, let me tell you what Medbelle is all about.

As you know, the healthcare system as we know it can often be inefficient, disorganised and overstretched. Its complicated administrative processes contribute largely to its struggle to keep up with rapidly advancing technology, resulting in bad experiences for both patients and healthcare professionals alike.

As the first digital hospital, we are rebuilding the healthcare experience from scratch. This is what allows us to provide patients with an outstanding level of care that we would love to experience ourselves.

Backed by renowned international investors, we are helping an ever-growing number of patients receive the highest quality of medical procedures the UK has to offer. To help us maintain this level of care, we need to expand our Growth team with highly motivated and passionate people who thrive in a fast-paced and dynamic work environment.

----

What you will do:

- Create & Restructure Reports in Google Sheets & self-service BI solution
- Augment & ensure the quality of data warehouse contents along with arising information requirements and evolving source data (by enhancing the transformation layer in SQL)
- Maintain smooth operation and extend the functionality of python-based airflow web application for ELT, notification & provisioning of data to Google Sheets
- Perform ad-hoc analyses regarding current business-related opportunities & bottleneck issues for various stakeholders within the company
- Communicate necessary adjustments in source data origination with Product- & Engineering-department and monitor deployment. 
- Periodically evaluate current BI stack & optimize infrastructure if necessary

What you bring to the table:

- Good working knowledge of basic programming patterns (loops, if statements, functions, classes, ...)
- Basic Python OR other (preferably object-oriented) programming language + interest to familiarize with python
- Good (Redshift- / Postgre-)SQL foundation (incl. window functions, common table expressions, basic regex)
- Good Excel / Google Sheets skills
- First experience with a dashboarding solution (Tableau, Qlik, PowerBI, Looker, Mode)
- Basic Understanding of ETL / ELT & Data Warehousing Concepts (Kimball Modelling)
- Good working knowledge of Git / Github
- First experience in merging & consolidating data from different sources 
- Good English level
- You’re self-driven and well able to autonomously conduct projects while identifying & training missing skills on the way
- First-hand experience with machine learning in R or Python considered a plus

What we offer you:

- This is an opportunity to become part of one of Berlin’s most successful startups and grow with the company
- When you’re doing a great job, you will always have the opportunity to take on more responsibility and grow professionally and personally
- You will work on real and challenging problems with smart people who care
- We do stuff together - Join the Medbelle family if you love Friday beers, team dinners and impeccable office banter


What the crew is like and why I love working here:

Our Medbelle family is a small and truly international team (75%+ internationals). We pride ourselves on our company culture that’s focused on building a great service with a professional emphasis on numbers and growth.

As a typical Berlin startup, we, of course, have the usual fun stuff: free coffee & British tea, fruits, pancake Tuesdays, an amazing office in Kreuzberg, Friday memes and team events we probably shouldn’t talk about here. But what I love most about working for Medbelle is the honest desire to help improve the experiences of our patients - that’s what keeps us motivated and driven.

We move quickly. If you are a great match, we can cover the initial phone interviews, an on-site interview with me and a chat with the founders all within two weeks. I look forward to hearing from you!

Sebastian Block

Head of Growth

jobs.title: Chief of Finance (CFO) (M/F/X)
jobs.description:
Hello,

My name is Leander and I am one of the co-founders here at Medbelle, where it is our mission to build the first digital hospital.

First of all, let me tell you what Medbelle is all about.

The healthcare system as we know it can often be inefficient, disorganised and overstretched. Its complicated administrative processes contribute largely to its struggle to keep up with rapidly advancing technology, resulting in bad experiences for both patients and healthcare professionals alike.

As the first digital hospital, we are rebuilding the healthcare experience for elective medical procedures (mostly surgery) from scratch. This is what allows us to provide patients with an outstanding level of care that we would love to experience ourselves.

Backed by renowned international investors, we are providing an ever-growing number of patients with the highest quality of care the UK has to offer. Having grown from a few visionary early employees to a growing post-Series A company in a short period of time, we are now looking for an experienced Head of Finance / CFO to strengthen the executive team of the company and further improve established finance processes.

Your role includes three responsibility areas:

Operational Finance
- Management and growth of the finance team and all of its processes
- Coordination of all external advisors (i.e. tax advisors and lawyers) with regards to tax- or legal-related matters
- Coordination of the company´s budgeting process with all departments and the company´s management team
- Ownership of the preparation of the financial statements on the entity and the group level
- Performance of cost analyses and support of all departments in managing their expenditures
- Supervise cash management and forecast the liquidity planning
- Management of the intercompany transfer pricing process between the company´s two legal entities
- Manage legal matters (especially with regards to finance)

Strategic Support
- Active involvement in Medbelle´s strategy development and company steering together with the top management team with a company-wide view on the entire business
- Close interaction with the company´s operational departments to support the company´s strategic and operational performance
- Projection and modelling of the Medbelle´s strategic and operational performance
- Management of the company´s internal controlling and reporting including monitoring and analyzing KPIs

Investor Relations
- Management of the communication with investors and preparation of all necessary documents for respective meetings
- Active involvement in acquiring the capital needed for growth and support the founders throughout upcoming funding rounds

Your profile:

- You have an advanced degree in accounting, business, finance, or a related field; an MBA or CPA is also highly desirable or equivalent qualification
- You bring along several years of (executive) leadership and management experience (in finance) in high growth companies
- You have excellent analytical skills, love working with numbers, use basic statistics to inform your decisions on a regular basis and have proficient knowledge with common tools
- You have a strong digital affinity and have digitised finance processes before
- You have a good understanding of Venture Capital, having raised larger VC rounds and managed VC shareholders is a plus
- You have a highly cooperative leadership style and contribute to a productive and positive work environment
- You have the ability to think not only strategically but also operationally and are not afraid of being hands-on overseeing the operational day-to-day running of the business alongside driving the business forward
- Excellent English and good German skills
- Industry expertise in healthcare, especially hospitals, is a plus
- A very structured approach to tackling problems

What the Medbelle family is like:

Our Medbelle family is a small and truly international team (80%+ internationals). We pride ourselves on our company culture that’s focused on building a great service with a professional emphasis on numbers and growth.

As a typical Berlin startup, we, of course, have the usual fun stuff: free coffee & British tea, fruits, pancake Tuesdays, an amazing Villa in Kreuzberg, Friday memes and team events we probably shouldn’t talk about here. But what I love most about our team is the honest desire to help improve the experiences of our patients - that’s what keeps us motivated and driven.

As an essential part of the management team, you can leave your mark on the digital hospital and how we will look at medical procedures in the future

Leander de Laporte & Daniel Kolb

jobs.description:

Having grown from a few visionary early employees to a growing post-Series A company in a short period of time, we are now looking for expert(!) freelancers to support our growth in paid channels.

Freelance positions

We are looking for absolute experts in their field who can guide an experienced paid marketing team to the next level with their experience.

- AdWords expert with a focus on bidding optimisation (value optimized bidding / ROAS bidding (Facebook and Google Ads)
- Paid Social Expert to build up social from scratch (specifically testing different campaign concepts and rolling out proven ones)

Big plus

- Strong experience with paid new user acquisition for a B2C business with high order values and long funnel conversion times
- Experience with the application of conversion value prediction to improve bidding
- Experience with Facebook / Google policy restricted products, specifically healthcare (due to e.g. limited retargeting options, strict ad creative rules)

We are looking forward to working with you!

Leander

Build strong relationships with managers, team leaders, and the team to ensure a great employee experience in line with our Medbelle culture and vision.
Handle our visa, work permit and relocation management (together with the relocation agency)
Review and renew company policies and legal compliance
Assist with planning and executing our employee well-being activities, such as birthday gifts, team events etc.
What you bring to the table:

2+ years experience in an HR position in a startup environment
Solid knowledge in German labour law, in particular in employee relations

Strong communication skills and emotional intelligence

Hi there!

My name is Sebastian and I am the Head of Finance here at Medbelle, where it is our mission to build the first digital hospital.

First of all, let me tell you what Medbelle is all about.

As you know, the healthcare system as we know it can often be inefficient, disorganised and overstretched. Its complicated administrative processes contribute largely to its struggle to keep up with rapidly advancing technology, resulting in bad experiences for both patients and healthcare professionals alike.

As the first digital hospital, we are rebuilding the healthcare experience from scratch. This is what allows us to provide patients with an outstanding level of care that we would love to experience ourselves.

Backed by renowned international investors, we are helping an ever-growing number of patients receive the highest quality of medical procedures the UK has to offer. To help us maintain this level of care, we need to expand our Finance department with highly motivated and passionate people who thrive in a fast-paced and dynamic work environment.

We are looking for someone to start in March 2020. 


What you will do:

- Operational tasks like transaction management
- The reconciliation of our accounting tools
- Assist in preparing financial statements
- Analytical tasks like performing cost analyses and liquidity planning
- The possibility to assume responsibility and own the operational Finance processes
- The possibility to learn to work with innovative accounting tools like Candis and QBO as well as other classic software tools like Salesforce, Trello and Slack.
- All tasks need to be performed in close coordination with our other departments which allows for direct insights into and interaction with our operational business

What you bring to the table:

- Are comfortable in both German and English
- Have completed or are completing a degree in Finance or Business
- Have basic accounting knowledge and a good skill set in Excel/Gsheets
- Thrive in a fast-paced environment and have impeccable time-management and organisational skills
- Can bring a positive attitude to work with you every day

What the crew is like and why I love working here:

Our Medbelle family is a small and truly international team (75%+ internationals). We pride ourselves on our company culture that’s focused on building a great service with a professional emphasis on numbers and growth.

As a typical Berlin startup, we, of course, have the usual fun stuff: free coffee, fruits, Tuesday brunch, an amazing office in Kreuzberg, Friday memes and team events we probably shouldn’t talk about here. But what I love most about working for Medbelle is the honest desire to help improve the experiences of our patients - that’s what keeps us motivated and driven.

We move quickly. If you are a great match, we can cover the initial phone interviews, an on-site interview with me and a chat with the founders all within two weeks. I look forward to hearing from you!

Sebastian (Head of Finance)
